alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Salt Basin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 10:42PM CST until January 12 at 5:00AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...In New Mexico, West Central Tularosa Basin/White Sands. In Texas, Eastern/Central El Paso County and Salt Basin. * WHEN...Until 4 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Salt Basin
